name: Orijen
description: Orijen was established in 2000 by a keen group of design and marketing professionals with extensive experience in Hong Kong and the other Asian markets. We offer strategic branding, marketing communications and design services. Our combined skills in the creative, design, planning, project management and marketing disciplines are brought together to enable good thinking and integrated creativity from the very beginning of a project.

locations.address: Suite 1601 Pacific Plaza 418 Des Voeux Road West
